mixins.name: flatButton
mixins.desc: Add styles for a flat button with a bottom border to give an embossed effect. Arguments allow you to control colour, border thickness, text contrast, optional icon styles and rounding.
mixins.params:
parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
$classname

*Required - class name for the element

Stringâ€”none
$bgCol

Background colour of the button

#hex/rgba#d73f2b
$thickness

Thickness of the bottom border

Pixel value5px
$contrast

Percentage of contrast to be applied to text

Percent45%
$rounding

Border-radius value

Pixel value3px
mixins.include:
@include flatButton('flat-primary',#289e83);
@include flatButton('flat-secondary',#1b8898);
@include flatButton('flat-warning',#d7861e);
@include flatButton('flat-danger', #ac2828);
@include flatButton('flat-submit',#54A03A);
mixins.mixin:
@mixin flatButton($classname, $bgCol: #d73f2b, $thickness: 5px, $contrast: 45%, $rounding: 3px) { 

	$bgCol : Col($bgCol);

	button.#{$className}, .button.#{$className}{

		display: inline-block; 			
		outline:none;
		padding: 10px 20px;
		margin-bottom: 10px;
		cursor: pointer;
		color: contrast($bgCol,$contrast);
		position:relative;
		background-color:$bgCol;
		border-radius:$rounding;
		border-style: solid;
		border-width:$thickness;
		border-top:none;
		border-left:none;
		border-right: none;
		border-bottom-color: darken($bgCol,10%);
		font-weight: 600;
		line-height: inherit;
		font-family: inherit;
		@include fontSize(16);

		&.large{
			
			padding: 12px 25px;
			@include fontSize(20);
		}

		&.small{
			
			padding: 5px 10px;
			@include fontSize(14);
		}

		&:hover, &:focus{
			
			color: contrast($bgCol,($contrast * 1.3));
			background-color:darken($bgCol,5%);
		}

		&:active{

			border-bottom-width:1px;
			margin-bottom: 2px;
			top: 3px;
		}

		@if($icons){

			&[class^="block-icon-"]:before, &[class*=" block-icon-"]:before {
				font-family: 'block-icon-set';
			}

			&[class^="line-icon-"]:before, &[class*=" line-icon-"]:before{
				font-family: 'line-icon-set';
			}

			&[class^="block-icon-"], &[class*=" block-icon-"], &[class^="line-icon-"], &[class*=" line-icon-"] {

				padding-right: 50px;

				&:before{

					text-transform: none;
					line-height: 1;
					position: absolute;
					top:50%;
					right:10px;
					margin-top:-10px;
					font-weight: normal;
					@include fontSize(18);
				}

				&:after{

					content: "";
					position: absolute;
					width:1px;
					background: darken($bgCol,10%);
					right:35px;
					top:0;
					bottom:0;
				}
			}

		}
	}

 }

mixins.name: gradientButton
mixins.desc: Add styles for an old school gradient button for that retro vibe. Arguments allow you to control colour, gradient contrast, text contrast, optional icon styles and rounding.
mixins.params:
parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
$classname

*Required - class name for the element

Stringâ€”none
$bgCol

Background colour of the button

#hex/rgba#d73f2b
$amount

Percentage of contrast for either side of the gradient

Percent10%
$contrast

Percentage of contrast to be applied to text

Percent45%
$icons

If set to true additional icon classes will be added

Booleantrue
$rounding

Border-radius value

Pixel value3px
mixins.include:
@include gradientButton('grad-primary',#289e83);
@include gradientButton('grad-secondary',#1b8898);
@include gradientButton('grad-warning',#d7861e);
@include gradientButton('grad-danger',#ac2828);
@include gradientButton('grad-submit',#54A03A);
mixins.mixin:
@mixin gradientButton($classname, $bgCol: #d73f2b, $amount: 10%, $contrast: 45%, $icons: true, $rounding: 3px) { 

	$bgCol : Col($bgCol);

	button.#{$className}, .button.#{$className}{

		$top : lighten($bgCol,$amount);
		$bottom : darken($bgCol,$amount);

		display: inline-block; 			
		outline:none;
		padding: 10px 20px;
		margin-bottom: 10px;
		cursor: pointer;
		color: contrast($bgCol,$contrast);
		position:relative;
		border-radius:$rounding;
		border:1px solid $bottom;
		font-weight: 600;
		line-height: inherit;
		font-family: inherit;
		@include linearGradient($top,$bottom);
		@include fontSize(16);

		&.large{
			
			padding: 12px 25px;
			@include fontSize(20);
		}

		&.small{
			
			padding: 5px 10px;
			@include fontSize(14);
		}

		&:hover, &:focus{

			$hovert : darken($top,5%);
			$hoverb : darken($bottom,5%);
			
			color: contrast($bgCol,($contrast * 1.3));
			@include linearGradient($hovert,$hoverb);
		}

		&:active{

			border-bottom-width:1px;
			margin-bottom: 2px;
			top: 3px;
		}

		@if($icons){

			&[class^="block-icon-"]:before, &[class*=" block-icon-"]:before {
				font-family: 'block-icon-set';
			}

			&[class^="line-icon-"]:before, &[class*=" line-icon-"]:before{
				font-family: 'line-icon-set';
			}

			&[class^="block-icon-"], &[class*=" block-icon-"], &[class^="line-icon-"], &[class*=" line-icon-"] {

				padding-right: 50px;

				&:before{

					text-transform: none;
					line-height: 1;
					position: absolute;
					top:50%;
					right:10px;
					margin-top:-10px;
					font-weight: normal;
					@include fontSize(18);
				}

				&:after{

					content: "";
					position: absolute;
					width:1px;
					background: darken($bgCol,10%);
					right:35px;
					top:0;
					bottom:0;
				}
			}

		}
	}

 }
mixins.output:
button.grad-primary, .button.grad-primary {
 display: inline-block;
 outline: none;
 padding: 10px 20px;
 margin-bottom: 10px;
 cursor: pointer;
 color: #bdeee3;
 position: relative;
 border-radius: 3px;
 border: 1px solid #1e7561;
 font-weight: 600;
 line-height: inherit;
 font-family: inherit;
 background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, 50% 0%, 50% 100%, color-stop(0%, #32c7a5), color-stop(100%, #1e7561));
 background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(#32c7a5, #1e7561);
 background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(#32c7a5, #1e7561);
 background-image: linear-gradient(#32c7a5, #1e7561);
 font-size: 16px;
 font-size: 1rem;
}
button.grad-primary.large, .button.grad-primary.large {
 padding: 12px 25px;
 font-size: 20px;

mixins.demo:
<button class="grad-primary block-icon-add-user">
	Primary
</button>

<button class="grad-secondary block-icon-chat">
	Secondary
</button>

<button class="grad-warning block-icon-block">
	Warning
</button>

<button class="grad-danger block-icon-cross">
	Danger
</button>

<button class="grad-submit block-icon-check">
	Submit
</button>
